original_text: Now when this was noised abroad, the multitude came together, and were confounded, because that every man heard them speak in his own language.
korean_text: 이 소리가 나매 큰 무리가 모여 각각 자기의 방언으로 제자들이 말하는 것을 듣고 소동하여

sentences.original_text: Now when this was noised abroad
because that every man heard them speak
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 그들이 말하는 것을 들었기 때문입니다
